body: Shai, To assign different glazing ratios for individual zones (ratios that will be applied in all cardinal directions), you want to graft the input list of glazing ratios and as well as the input list of zones before connecting them to the "Glazing Based On Ratio" component. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/8b9WEPYSkGLQ1CxMO5MATrFGtJP1TwUl*NDOMP-5aGQSg68-SXmWrm5HkNEVJ66j6zA89R2dk1vUOZqQvk1-4KYJVZcPasW6/GraftGlzRatios.PNG) You can also combine this grafted logic with 4 ratios per tree branch to assign individual cardinal directions for each of the zones. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/8b9WEPYSkGIo6BkwI1erKp1oqjKqtkc9unKqOWEUjgEnADPpIJBp49o5DF13w2a3Zs7WqRLCkrFvErFx7ZqnwfNiiXHffVkM/GraftGlzRatios2.PNG) -Chris
